response.visual caption: A facade with three different colors of paint and with damage.
response.your notes: The building across the street has a facade with three different sections. The leftmost section is light blue, with a dark section below, and a visible hole in the wall. The middle section is off-white with some exposed brick and a couple of pipes, and the right section is a red-brown color. There is no visible greenery.

response.label: left building section
response.visual caption: A light blue wall with some decorative elements and a black tiled section at the bottom.
response.your notes: This is the leftmost section of the building. It has a light blue section with a white awning-like decoration, a large hole in the wall, and a black tiled section at the bottom.

response.label: middle building section
response.visual caption: An off-white wall with visible damage and exposed brick.
response.your notes: This is the middle section of the building. It's an off-white wall with visible damage, including a section where the brick is exposed. There is also a pipe and some writing on the wall.

response.label: right building section
response.visual caption: A red-brown wall with graffiti and a stone base.
response.your notes: This is the rightmost section of the building. It's a red-brown wall with some graffiti, and it has a stone base.
